headline: Women Trying to Claim a Life of Oneâ€™s Own
abstract: A Grolier Club exhibition explores 500 years of women as scientists, midwives, writers, activists, undertakers and more.
lead_paragraph: Martha Maxwell stood only 4 feet 11 inches tall. But in the annals of natural history, she was a giant of a kind.
keywords: Five Hundred Years of Women's Work: The Lisa Unger Baskin Collection (Exhibit)
